name: Brownie Muffins
author: Sr. Rose Marie
instructions: Melt butter, chocolate, butter flavoring and nuts in a double boiler. In separate bowl, combine remaining ingredients. Combine the two mixtures and bake in muffin tins 25 to 30 minutes at 350Â°. The muffins should be chewy the top being a lighter brown than the rest of the muffin. They will be kind of crackly.
